class.name: xbkList
class.desc: The xbkList class display information in a list type system.

param.name: inst
param.comment: The name or id to be use for this xbkList.

param.name: parent
param.comment: The parent of the xbkList object.

method.name: setSelectedColor
method.method_desc: Set the background color of the selected row.

method.name: aHeading
method.method_desc: Set the heading of the xbkList.

method.name: addRow
method.method_desc: Set a row to the xbkList.

param.name: id
param.comment: A unique id for the row.

param.name: fhandler
param.comment: A reference to a function handler for the row.

param.name: id
param.comment: A unique id for the row.
